mapper.select: select id, order_id, eid, put_battery_sn, take_battery_sn, battery_type, put_cell_no, take_cell_no, status, order_seq, tenant_id, create_time, update_time from t_api_exchange_order where id = #{id}

select id, order_id, eid, put_battery_sn, take_battery_sn, battery_type, put_cell_no, take_cell_no, status, order_seq, tenant_id, create_time, update_time from t_api_exchange_order limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into t_api_exchange_order(order_id, eid, put_battery_sn, take_battery_sn, battery_type, put_cell_no, take_cell_no, status, order_seq, tenant_id, create_time, update_time) values (#{orderId}, #{eid}, #{putBatterySn}, #{takeBatterySn}, #{batteryType}, #{putCellNo}, #{takeCellNo}, #{status}, #{orderSeq}, #{tenantId}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update:
update t_api_exchange_order
order_id = #{orderId},
eid = #{eid},
put_battery_sn = #{putBatterySn},
take_battery_sn = #{takeBatterySn},
battery_type = #{batteryType},
put_cell_no = #{putCellNo},
take_cell_no = #{takeCellNo},
status = #{status},
order_seq = #{orderSeq},
tenant_id = #{tenantId},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
